items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute but short
items.body: Cute but very short. The sparkles are very cute. Lots of compliments Read more
items.author: Adriana Fisher

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars My 70th Birthday Party Dress
items.body: Fun-style dress. Accentuates your curves. Well made. Looks amazing on. Very happy with this dress. Read more
items.author: Barbara D Daniel

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love it! It just scrunches up in the front so just keep that in mind!!
items.body: I can’t believe how well this fits me and how amazing this looks!! Very classy, elegant yet sexy!!! It’s very comfortable and the quality isn’t bad for what you’re paying for!! I am very picky about my style as an ex fashion runway model and I am absolutely loving this look!!! Just be careful because the front where your breast is will scrunch up so you do have to make sure you pull your dress down when you stand up!! I put 4 stars because it does keep scrunching up in the front Read more
items.author: Jenni

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Holiday dress

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very sexy and comfortable night out dress
items.body: The media could not be loaded. The dress fits to size, I ordered a medium and usually wear an 8-10, it is very comfy and lose in my stomach. Love it! Read more
items.author: Jennifer Westfall

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars not what I expected
items.body: this is very short and tighter than I expected Read more
items.author: WendiAster

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Definitely a go-to dress for clubbing or special nights out!
items.body: I recently wore the Meetjen Women's Ruched Bodycon Mini Dress to a cocktail party, and I absolutely loved it! The mesh long sleeves and mock neck give it a classy yet sexy vibe, while the sequins add just the right amount of sparkle to stand out. The ruched design hugs my curves perfectly, making me feel confident and stylish all night. It’s comfortable enough to dance in but still looks super chic. Definitely a go-to dress for clubbing or special nights out! Read more
items.author: Joel S.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft fabric
items.body: Perfect for a night out true to size Read more
items.author: Val

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Ruched Cocktail Long Sleeve Bodycon is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Ruched Cocktail Long Sleeve Bodycon is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Red, Brown, Burgundy, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
